item.description:
What: Boston Duck Tour!!!
When: Sunday, June 5, 2011 11:30 AM (meet at the entry at 1045 to get your tickets from box office and get in line)

Where: Boston Duck Tours
3 Copley Place #310  (meeting at the Museum of Science for this tour to begin at 1100 AM.
Boston, MA 02116

 

Boston Duck Tour!  I've never done this so I love this idea!

 

Join us and take the kids. I suggest you all pack a lunch in a backpack and we will picnic either before or after on Boston Common!  Cross your fingers for great weather! I will pack a blanket, too.

 

Tickets for June 5  are now on sale and I have purchased mine for the 1130AM tour. We will meet at 1045 at the MOS entry to begin the tour.  My advice is to purchase online as they go quickly online and at the ticket booth. If you prefer the ticket booth, arrive before 845AM on June 5.

http://bostonducktours.com/

 

This is a cross meetup with our Life and Parenting After Divorce Meetup, Social Fun and Friends of Jen:

 

http://www.meetup.com/Friends-Of-Jen/about/

 

http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/

 

http://www.meetup.com/divorcesupport-276/
item.how_to_find_us: Meeting at the Museum of Science Entry

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Duck Tour !
